last_episode_to_air.name: Answers and Questions
last_episode_to_air.overview: Cam and Reggie are at odds about getting involved in a deal that involves abandoned school property, Missy is determined to pursue any lead that might get her out of the shadow of the Calloway clan and M-Chuck’s pursuit of her writing talent pits her against Cassie in a way that might never get resolved. A surprise revelation from Jimmy Flaherty leaves Cam with a choice to make: suit up or sell out.

name: Survivor's Remorse
overview: Cam Calloway is about to find out the price he'll pay for stardom, love and loyalty. A basketball star in his early 20s, Calloway's life changes after he signs a multimillion-dollar contract with a team in Atlanta. He arrives in Georgia bright-eyed and eager to begin his career, joined by cousin and confidant Reggie Vaughn, who tries to keep Cam focused and free from distractions caused by Cam's blunt-but-loyal sister M-Chuck and opportunistic mom Cassie. Feeling a responsibility to support needy family and friends, Cam wrestles with the rewards and pitfalls of sudden wealth and fame.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: In season two, we see Cam and his cousin and confidant Reggie Vaughn continue trying to navigate Cam’s meteoric rise. From business deals to relationships and friendship, the two confront the challenges of balancing the needs of family with the rewards and responsibilities generated by their newfound wealth and fame. Cam, Reggie and the unforgettable group of characters that is the Calloway clan wrestle with the rewards and pitfalls of stardom, love and loyalty.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: Calloway family bonds are tested as season three of Survivor’s Remorse explores themes of despair, religion, parenting and love.

episodes.name: In The Offing
episodes.overview: A sitcom about a young pro-basketball star and his opportunistic family entourage begins with the player arriving in Atlanta, where he deals with a new city, a new team and the same old relatives who take advantage of him and his generosity.

episodes.name: On the Carpet
episodes.overview: At a charity event for an abused child, Cam's mother goes overboard detailing a story about her son's upbringing, while Uncle Julius steps up as a "talent scout" for Cam.

episodes.name: How to Build a Brand
episodes.overview: Following Reggie and Missy's advice, Cam pays a visit to a dying, basketball-loving teen who hits him with a surprise request; Reggie suggests that Cam to put the family on the payroll.

episodes.name: The Decisions
episodes.overview: Missy works to score Reggie a membership in an exclusive country club that was founded by blacks, while Cam, in his search to support a church, gets a surprise from a pastor.

episodes.name: Out of the Past
episodes.overview: A childhood friend of Cam and Reggie's emerges - a talented baller derailed by prison time. Reggie gives Cassie a budget to house hunt. Cam considers a shoe endorsement deal.

episodes.name: Six
episodes.overview: When an old flame reaches out to Reggie, some of the family intervenes.

episodes.name: Grown-Ass Man
episodes.overview: The Calloways have left the penthouse and moved into a regal new mansion. Cam's new contract and its clauses ties him tightly to owner Jimmy Flaherty, who wants to maximize his time.

episodes.name: A Time to Punch
episodes.overview: Cam and M-Chuck have always fought like brothers. But media fallout and scrutiny from a DA making a point about domestic abuse takes them by surprise. Uncle Julius battles with a neighbor whose dog does his business on the Calloway driveway.

episodes.name: M.V.P.
episodes.overview: Cassie returns to the dating world and her determination to get what she wants sets her on a collision course with Cam. Reggie meets the peculiar and brilliant man who made Flaherty all his money.

episodes.name: Homebound
episodes.overview: It's Cam's first game back in Boston and the pressure is getting to him...and to Reggie. The family takes a cultural tour of a plantation, where M-Chuck decides to delve into the lingering racial tensions.

episodes.name: One-Love
episodes.overview: Reggie meets Jupiter Blackmon, a college prospect headed for the NFL, whose manager rustles up trouble. Reggie sees an opportunity to rep Jupiter. M-Chuck is drawn into the world of a young pregnant girl.

episodes.name: The Dagger
episodes.overview: Chen is throwing a gala to launch Cam's shoe but his focus is wooing Cassie. Cam, usually smart about mixing work and romance, is reckless with a reporter. When it goes awry, Reggie tries not to say "Told ya."

episodes.name: The Injury
episodes.overview: Just when Cam couldn't be lower, facing a career ending injury, he meets a girl who could be "the one." Reggie's life would be easier with only one, as repping Jupiter starts to seem like a fool's errand.

episodes.name: The Date
episodes.overview: Smitten with Allison, Cam puts on a magical first date. Uncle Julius learns how the other half lives on a disturbing jaunt with the police and M-Chuck uses her therapy to drive her mother crazy with guilt.

episodes.name: Guts
episodes.overview: Jupiter's draft status hangs in the balance so Reggie enlists Missy to tutor him. Missy thinks it'll be a snap but is challenged. Cam and Allison's romance expands, as do Reggie's business prospects.

episodes.name: Starts and Stops
episodes.overview: Reggie questions his decision to represent Jupiter, but Cam has no doubt about Allison. He is in love...even more so after Allison declines his expensive gifts. The family experiences a crisis.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: In season two, we see Cam and his cousin and confidant Reggie Vaughn continue trying to navigate Cam’s meteoric rise. From business deals to relationships and friendship, the two confront the challenges of balancing the needs of family with the rewards and responsibilities generated by their newfound wealth and fame. Cam, Reggie and the unforgettable group of characters that is the Calloway clan wrestle with the rewards and pitfalls of stardom, love and loyalty.

episodes.name: Night of the Crash
episodes.overview: The family copes with the tragic loss of a family member and the sudden hole it leaves in their lives.

episodes.name: The Ritual
episodes.overview: The Calloway and Vaughns comfort one another as they try to navigate their way through the most trying ritual of their lives in Atlanta.

episodes.name: The Thank-You Note
episodes.overview: After meeting a wealthy Atlanta couple, Reggie and Missy argue about the importance of modern manners and the role that etiquette plays in social affairs.

episodes.name: The Age of Umbrage
episodes.overview: A scandal erupts after Cam's words during an interview are taken out of context, leading to the creation of the Calloway Philanthropic Trust.

episodes.name: The Photoshoot
episodes.overview: Media-consultant Missy deals with fallout from a suspect decision at Cam's photo shoot; Chen and Cassie deal with their long-distance relationship via technology.

episodes.name: No Child Left Behind
episodes.overview: Following a DNA test, Cassie meets a new family who helps her experience the traditions of the culture; Cam and Reggie attempt to get rid of Uncle Julius' gun.

episodes.name: The Guests
episodes.overview: Cam and Reggie go back to Boston for a wedding. M-Chuck pursues a new relationship-with many different women.

episodes.name: Mystery Team
episodes.overview: Reggie and Flaherty battle over a contract extension for Cam.

episodes.name: Second Thoughts
episodes.overview: Cam uncovers secrets about his family's past and deals with the fallout.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: Calloway family bonds are tested as season three of Survivor’s Remorse explores themes of despair, religion, parenting and love.

episodes.name: Fallout
episodes.overview: Cam, Reggie, and Mary Charles' attempts to reconcile their paternal relationships see varying results. Cassie and Chen attempt to enjoy their time in Shanghai.

episodes.name: Repercussions
episodes.overview: Cam's visit to Walpole sends him on a wild goose chase in to the past, Missy gets a worrisome phone call, and M-Chuck gives some teenagers a piece of her mind.

episodes.name: Closure
episodes.overview: M-Chuck has unconventional ideas about closure and Cam sees his father in a new light. Reggie and Trent head north.

episodes.name: Feel Free to Comment
episodes.overview: Cam and Allison have a run-in with some fans, Reggie advises Missy to think twice about taking on a job, and Cassie's podcast lands on a hot topic.

episodes.name: The Gala
episodes.overview: Cam gets passionate with his vision for the Calloway Philanthropic Trust's first fundraiser.

episodes.name: Reparations
episodes.overview: Cam takes his basketball ambition in a new direction; Chen gets the wrong idea about Cassie's new hobby; Missy makes a troubling discovery.

episodes.name: Optics
episodes.overview: Cam and Allison take a road trip. Mary Charles has a bone to pick with a museum donor. Reggie tries to get in on a deal with Chen.

episodes.name: Future Plans
episodes.overview: Cam and Reggie discuss the future, Cassie seeks spiritual affirmation, and Missy needs a favor from her parents.

episodes.name: Family Ties
episodes.overview: Cassie catches up with an old friend. Cam and Reggie visit a school. Missy and Allison each receive some unsolicited advice.

episodes.name: Answers and Questions
episodes.overview: Cam and Reggie are at odds about getting involved in a deal that involves abandoned school property, Missy is determined to pursue any lead that might get her out of the shadow of the Calloway clan and M-Chuck’s pursuit of her writing talent pits her against Cassie in a way that might never get resolved. A surprise revelation from Jimmy Flaherty leaves Cam with a choice to make: suit up or sell out.
